taskDescription: Amygdalin, or laetrile, is a cyanogenic glycoside first isolated in 1830 from almond and apricot seeds. If acidic hydrolysis of amygdalin liberates HCN, along with benzaldehyde cyanohydrin with gentiobiose (Problem 25-54), what is its structure?
